meanings.definition: The hard, variously colored calcareous skeletons secreted by certain marine polyps.

meanings.sent2: The corals in the reef provide shelter for many sea creatures.

meanings.sent5: The vibrant corals swayed gently with the ocean currents.

meanings.definition: A rocklike deposit consisting of the calcareous skeletons of coral polyps.
